metadata.inclusion: Press the function button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The smoke detector will emit a 2-tone beep and the LED will turn on for ~2 seconds.
metadata.exclusion: Press the function button 3 times within 1.5 seconds and the smoke detector will be removed from the Z-Wave network.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the button of the smoke detector for 20 seconds then release the button when you hear 3 beeps.
